name: Milk Burglar
description: A hired contractor paid to steal milk from the homes of innocent unsuspecting families.

name: Milk Mine
description: Extract milk from frozen cows by cutting them open and scooping it out.

name: Bluetooth Udders
description: Produces milk without the need to feed or store a full blown cow.

name: Milkologist
description: A specialist that can turn water into milk, the same way Jesus turned water into wine.

name: Atmospheric Milk Generator
description: Extracts milk from the air via a method of condensation. Note: vegan.

name: Milk Photosynthesizer
description: Takes the heat of the sun and performs a special process on it to convert it to milk.

name: Particle Accelerator
description: Beam particles together to alter the forms of matter into milk.

name: Exoplanet
description: Planets where the atmosphere is primarily made from milk.

name: Max
description: Converts matter into milk by looking at it.
